Package it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.communication_message.message_asking_controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Afk
    This class represents a message of AFK It being used by class TimerAFK to say at the server that a player didn't do an input for some seconds The server after will skip the turn at the player
    AskForAllPowerups
    This class represents a message to ask at the Controller using a powerUp for a player
    AskGrab
    * This class being used by view to ask at controller to grab something
    AskMoveAround
    This class being used by view to ask at controller to move a player
    AskPowerUPTeleOrNew
    This class being used by view to ask at controller to use the powerUps(Teleporter or Newton)
    AskReload
    This class being used by view to ask at controller to reload the weapons of the player
    AskShoot
    This class being used by view to ask at controller to use a weapon
    AskTargetingScope
    This class being used by view to ask at controller to use the targeting Scope
    EndRound
    This class being used by Controller to warn the view that a normal Round is finished
    MoveBeforeShoot
    This class being used by view to ask at controller to move a player before to shoot(Frenzy action)
    RequestToRespawn
    This class being used Controller to warn the view that the player must choose where he wants to respawn
    RequestToUseGrenade
    This class being used Controller to warn the view that the player must choose a grenade venom to use
    StartFrenesy
    This class being used Controller to warn the view that a turn of Frenzy of type A is started
    StartFrenesyB
    This class being used Controller to warn the view that a turn of Frenzy of type B is started
    StartTerminator
    This class being used Controller to warn the view that a turn of Terminator is started
